sugarMas.name: Sugar Mas
sugarMas.description: St. Kitts & Nevis National Carnival featuring six weeks of masquerade and street carnival celebrating cultural heritage.
sugarMas.significance: Celebrates freedom, creativity, and community identity rooted in post-slavery era

nevisCulturama.name: Nevis Culturama Festival
nevisCulturama.description: Nevis's premier arts and culture festival, celebrating Nevisian heritage through music, dance, and colorful parades.
nevisCulturama.timing: annually from late July to early August
nevisCulturama.purpose: preserve cultural heritage through music, dance, and parades
keyEvents: Junior Cultural Street Parade (designed for families)
Folk competitions (storytelling, craft demonstrations, cooking contests)

restaurantWeek.name: St. Kitts and Nevis Restaurant Week
restaurantWeek.description: A 10-day culinary celebration featuring a theme ingredient.
keyEvents: St. Kitts Grill Fest (July 26, FREE admission, family-friendly grilling competition)
Taste at Twilight (July 27, ticketed fine dining experience)
Charity dinners and special chef collaborations

nevisMangoFestival.name: Nevis Mango Festival
nevisMangoFestival.description: Celebrates the island's beloved mango fruit with tastings, cocktail competitions, and culinary showcases.
events: Passport Food Tour sampling mango-infused dishes
For the Love of Mangoes event with cooking competition and concert
nevisMangoFestival.specialOffers: Children under 12 attend free on Sunday

stKittsMusicFestival.name: St. Kitts Music Festival
stKittsMusicFestival.description: Premier Caribbean music event featuring international artists and local talent.
stKittsMusicFestival.atmosphere: Family-friendly festival with food vendors, craft booths, cultural displays

tickets.economicImpact: Major economic driver attracting visitors region-wide

crossChannelSwim.name: Nevis to St. Kitts Cross-Channel Swim
crossChannelSwim.description: A challenging 4km swim across 'the Narrows' between the two islands
crossChannelSwim.challenge: Swimming across the channel between St. Kitts and Nevis

cricketMatches.name: Caribbean Premier League
cricketMatches.description: Professional cricket matches featuring Caribbean teams
